title: Chicken, chorizo and black pudding pasta
ingredients: ['350g pasta (dried, if fresh cook at the very end)', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 chorizo sausages, cut into 1cm slices', '1 chicken breast, diced', '1 slice black pudding', '1 red pepper, diced', '1 red chilli, chopped (seeds optional)', '1 clove garlic', '1 handful of fresh rocket']
